RNAseq Visualize

rna_visualize.Rd

Visualize https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/edgeR/versions/3.14.0/topics/plotSmear

rna_visualize(data_table, method = "hist", lib = "ggplot")

Examples

rna_visualize(data_table, method="hist", lib="base")
#> [1] "using hist/base"
#> Error in hist(data_table$untreated1): object 'data_table' not found
rna_visualize(data_table, method="hist", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using hist/ggplot"
#> Error in ggplot(data_table): object 'data_table' not found
rna_visualize(data_table, method="boxplot", lib="base")
#> [1] "using boxplot/base"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="boxplot", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using boxplot/ggplot"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="density", lib="base")
#> [1] "using density/base"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="density", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using density/ggplot"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="cluster-gene", lib="base")
#> [1] "using cluster-gene/base"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="cluster-gene", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using cluster-gene/ggplot"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="cluster-expt", lib="base")
#> [1] "using cluster-expt/base"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="cluster-expt", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using cluster-expt/ggplot"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="MA", lib="base")
#> [1] "using MA/base"
#> Error in maPlot(data_table[, options[1]], data_table[, options[2]]): could not find function "maPlot"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="MA", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using MA/ggplot"
#> Error in rna_visualize(data_table, method = "MA", lib = "ggplot"): object 'data_table' not found
rna_visualize(data_table, method="smear", lib="base")
#> [1] "using smear/base"
#> Error in plotSmear(data_table): could not find function "plotSmear"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="smear", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using smear/ggplot"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="MDS", lib="base")
#> [1] "using MDS/base"
#> Error in plotMDS(data_table): object 'data_table' not found
rna_visualize(data_table, method="MDS", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using MDS/ggplot"
#> Error in counts(dds): could not find function "counts"
rna_visualize(data_table, method="PCA", lib="base")

rna_visualize(data_table, method="PCA", lib="ggplot")

rna_visualize(data_table, method="dispersion", lib="base")

rna_visualize(data_table, method="dispersion", lib="ggplot")

rna_visualize(data_table, method="volcano", lib="base")
#> [1] "using volcano/base"
#> Error in plot(data_table$log2FoldChange, -log10(data$pvalue), main = "Volcano Plot"): object 'data_table' not found
rna_visualize(data_table, method="volcano", lib="ggplot")
#> [1] "using volcano/ggplot"
#> Error in ggplot(data_table): object 'data_table' not found
